fairy_sparklers.name: Fairy Sparklers
fairy_sparklers.description: Multi-colored sparklers that are safe for any age.

bottle_rockets.name: Bottle Rockets
bottle_rockets.description: Will shoot out of a bottle.

earth_shaker.name: Earth Shaker
earth_shaker.description: Creates a large earth shattering boom.

wake_neighbors.name: Wake The Neighbors
wake_neighbors.description: Large, loud and bright. Will wake up entire neighborhood.

what_say.name: What Did You Say?
what_say.description: Our loudest commercially available product. Not responsible for loss of hearing.

black_snake.name: Black Snake
black_snake.description: Light on one end and watch snake expand.

bottle_caps.name: Bottle Caps
bottle_caps.description: Throw on ground and listen to the "pop".

normal_lighter.name: Normal Lighter
normal_lighter.description: This is just a lame, normal lighter.

door_opener.name: Door Opener
door_opener.description: Line the plastic explosive rope around the perimeter of locked door you are trying to unlock.

what_wall.name: What Wall?
what_wall.description: Place explosive in pentagram pattern to summon Satan and destroy wall.

hows_hand.name: Hows Your Hand?
hows_hand.description: Place on captives hand. He will not like how it feels on his hand.

ouch.name: Ouch
ouch.description: Will produce a loud and uncomfortable explosion that will hurt but not leave any visible marks.

shit_pants.name: Shit Your Pants
shit_pants.description: Explosion produces a specific sound wave that will make target shit their pants.

big_ouch.name: Big Ouch
big_ouch.description: Big Brother of Ouch. Same results with very visible marks. Also Death.

he_dead.name: He Dead
he_dead.description: Use this if you want to make dead.

what_earth.name: What Earth?
what_earth.description: Big Brother of What Wall?. Place on ground in pentagram pattern to summon Satan and destroy the entire planet.
